Row.Text: A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in the Capital, and the specific Doge received is random. Each Doge can only be received once. Cost increases per Doge trained.
Create a Menagerie in a City. This Menagerie receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Menagerie.
Create a Menagerie in a City. This Menagerie receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Menagerie.
Activate on the Palace to add +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to the Building.
Activate in the Capital to immediately add 1 Population.
Activate on an Acropolis to grant 75[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence (On Standard Speed).
Activate on a Library to add +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness to the Building.
Activate on a Library to add +3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to the Building.
